mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, contents, writer_id AS writerId, board_id AS boardId , created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}

SELECT A.comment_id AS commentId, A.contents, A.writer_id AS writerId , B.nm AS writerName, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM comment A JOIN user B ON A.writer_id = B.user_id WHERE A.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.comment_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{len}
